name: Geronimo Stilton in the Kingdom of Fantasy
name_original: Geronimo Stilton in the Kingdom of Fantasy
description:
Geronimo Stilton is the editor-in-chief of the most widely read newspaper of New Mouse City: The Rodent’s Gazette. He is also a best-selling author and often travels around the world to find new experiences and fresh ideas for his books.
Today though, Geronimo Stilton’s travels will take him even further afield – to a fantasy land filled with witches, mermaids, dragons, pixies and giants!
Help Geronimo Stilton and his friend Scribblehopper overcome 62 brain-teasing puzzles, riddles and action-packed mini-games as they cross the Kingdom of Fantasy to save the Fairy Queen.
Meet loads of colorful characters as the much-loved book series comes to life on your PSP® system, with all the fun, imagination and great story-telling you’d expect from Geronimo Stilton.
Compatible with PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) and PlayStation®Vita systems.
